(Film - Drama)

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with terminal cancer, mercenary Wade Wilson undergoes a rogue experiment that tortures him and leaves him heavily disfigured. With a set of newly-acquired skills and accelerated healing abilities, he sets out to take down the man responsible. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Starring Academy Award winner George Clooney, this sci-fi adventure follows the exploits of Casey, a curious teenager, and Frank, a disengaged former inventor, who embark on a dangerous mission to unravel the secrets of Tomorrowland, an unexplored dimension in time and space. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Maleficent is a kind-hearted fairy, who wants peace to prevail in the kingdom. She is deceived by the love of her life, Stefan, who wants to be the king. In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: Thomas loses his memory and finds himself trapped in a massive maze called the Glade. He and his friends try to escape from the maze and eventually learn that they are subjects of an experiment. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Avengers: Age Of Ultron
programme.desc: The second instalment of the 'Avengers' franchise brings the superheroes back together and this time, the stakes are higher than ever. With a view to stop the world from fighting anymore, Tony Stark enlists Bruce Banner's help to create an artificial intelligence called Ultron. But Tony's habit of playing God will end up costing the world as Ultron's personality takes charge of a robot's body, manufacturing several more like himself to declare war on the human race. Iron Man, Hulk, Captain America, Thor, Hawkeye and Black Widow are joined by a trusted few as they take on this very dangerous villain. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp
programme.desc: With a few days left of his house arrest, Scott Lang dons the suit to help Hank and Hope 'the Wasp' Pym, who are on a risky quest to bring back Janet, Hope's mother, from the quantum realm while evading a powerful ghost-like being. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Train To Busan
programme.desc: (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Captain Marvel
programme.desc: In 1995, Starforce member Vers and her team are sent to Earth in order to rescue an undercover operative infiltrating the Skrulls, the shapeshifters. During her mission, Vers gets separated from her team and is stranded on Earth. She meets S.H.I.E.L.D. Agent Nick Fury and with his help finds out that she had a life on Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: When he is falsely framed in a CIA operation, Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin, in order to figure out why they are still after him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Superstar Brad Pitt lends his voice to the daredevil adventure-seeker from Middle East, Sinbad the Sailor, who is falsely accused of stealing a legendary magical Book of Peace. To make matters worse, malevolent goddess Eris puts forth a challenge giving Sinbad ten days to find the book or his childhood friend Prince Proteus will take the death penalty on his behalf. Sinbad and Proteus' fiancee Marina set out to face every obstacle that comes their way in order to save their dear Proteus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Starring action stalwarts Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger, the movie revolves around the exploits of a security system expert who is imprisoned in a high-tech prison and must figure out an ingenious way to escape. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the world has been ravaged by the dragons that were accidentally awakened from their slumber by humans. Now it is up to Quinn Abercromby (Christian Bale) and Denton Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey) to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An alien race destroys major cities of the world with their advanced weaponry. However, a geek, a pilot, the US President and a group of ragtag survivors unite to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Maleficent

In a turn of events, he cuts her wings and is crowned the king. A scorned Maleficent is hell-bent on attaining justice in her own ways. When she realises that Stefan is blessed with a daughter, Aurora, she places a curse on her. She reveals that on her sixteenth birthday, she will prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel, which will cause her to fall into a deathlike sleep. Later, Maleficent realises that Aurora is the only one who can help restore peace in the kingdom and to her too. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Little Mermaid
programme.desc: Ariel, a mermaid, flouts rules of the mermaid kingdom and gets fascinated with the human world. When she meets Prince Eric, she falls in love with him and resolves to find a way to be with him. In the process, she ends up striking a dangerous deal with Ursula, a sea witch. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: A Bug's Life
programme.desc: Flik, an odd ball of an ant, may be pint sized but he has tremendous courage. When the anthill he resides in is threatened by arrogant grasshoppers, he sets out to create an army to deal with them, recruiting the most incompetent bugs of course. A man with exceptional humour inducing skills, Dave Foley lends his voice to play Flik. Directors John Lasseter, and Andrew Stanton procure some of the biggest names on television and film for 'A Bug's Life'. Julia Louis-Dreyfuss, Kevin Spacey and Hayden Pannettiere are but a few. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the distant future, a weary Logan provides for an ailing Professor X with the help of Caliban. His hideaway is exposed when he inadvertently becomes the protector of Laura, a young mutant on the run from a corporation and its hoodlums. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Great Wall

Once there, William ends up befriending Lin, a young commander, and decides to assist the Nameless Order in accomplishing their selfless mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: Three years after Jurassic World is destroyed, Claire Dennis, its former manager, is recruited to save its dinosaurs from an impending volcano. She enlists the help of Owen Grady, a velociraptor trainer. But the duo soon discovers that the dinosaurs may be in a bigger peril than they anticipated. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: The Croods
programme.desc: This animated 3D adventure film tells the story of the world's first family road trip where Grub, a caveman, treks to an unfamiliar world in search of a new home along with his family after their cave is destroyed in a natural disaster. Guy, a nomad, joins the family in their adventure and helps them cope up with the fear of the unknown. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Prince Of Persia: The Sands Of Time
programme.desc: With the help of a special, magical dagger that can help reverse time, a young prince and a princess must stop an evil villain whose actions threaten to destroy the world. (Film - Action)

programme.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2
programme.desc: Hiccup and Toothless find themselves in a new battle against a mysterious Dragon Rider, Drago. He wants to start a war using the dragons to rule the world. The two, along with their friends, must stand up and fight against Drago together if they want to change the future for both humans and dragons. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Jaws 3-D
programme.desc: A group of marine biologists attempt to capture a young great white shark. Later, chaos follows when its ferocious mother breaks into the marine centre in order to avenge the death of its baby. (Film - Horror)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Cars
programme.desc: A big league racing car, Lightning McQueen, learns an important lesson in life when he rams into the pavements of Radiator Springs and is ordered to repave the roads again. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: When he is falsely framed in a CIA operation, Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin, in order to figure out why they are still after him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Iron Man 3
programme.desc: Tony Stark, an eccentric billionaire, philanthropist and also the Iron man, encounters a formidable foe called the Mandarin. After almost losing everything in a battle with his enemy, Tony embarks on a journey with relentless consequences and a suit that ceases to exist. Will the Iron man overcome his failure and defeat his obdurate adversary. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.desc: The Top Six travel to London, England, where they are divided into teams. To avoid elimination, the contestants must prepare an appetizer and an entree for 36 diners. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: Joanie becomes acquainted with EJ, an epigenetic scientist, while in Montauk for work. The two explore Joanie's family history, during which Joanie discovers the truth about her mother's death. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: American Idol
programme.desc: Several participants from America showcase their singing talent in front of a panel of esteemed judges to win the title and a record label deal. (TV Show - Reality - Music)

programme.title: MasterChef US
programme.desc: The top four contestants go to Hatfield House where they are joined by food writer Nigella Lawson. Later, in an hour, they must prepare a venison dish and a trifle. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: To prepare for the wedding, Whitney and Noah travel to Montauk. Later, Noah receives a concerning call from Petra, a reporter. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: Captain Strand tries to rebuild a firefighting company in Texas. He then tries to hide his cancer diagnosis from his son, TK, who goes down a dark hole after a failed relationship. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Saviors's new weapon proves to be an obstacle for Rick as he continues fighting with them. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Kevin, a man with dissociative identity disorder, has 23 distinct personalities. He abducts three teenage girls and takes them to an underground facility. While the girls struggle to rescue themselves, they take advantage of some of the personalities of Kevin and discover the truth about the terrifying 24th personality, the Beast. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
programme.desc: Jack Skellington, the king of a town, enters a Christmas village and discovers a new idea of celebrating Halloween and Christmas together but fails miserably. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Norah, a mechanical engineer, and her team must deal with an earthquake while they are working at the bottom of the Mariana Trench. While they try their best to get out of the ordeal, they discover that a few creatures belonging to an unidentified species are out to get them. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Toy Story 2
programme.desc: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the distant future, a weary Logan provides for an ailing Professor X with the help of Caliban. His hideaway is exposed when he inadvertently becomes the protector of Laura, a young mutant on the run from a corporation and its hoodlums. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: After Scrat's pursuit of an acorn sets off a series of asteroids to strike Earth, Manny, Sid, Diego and their herd must find a way to survive the impending doom. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Young demigod Percy Jackson sets off on a quest to find the Golden Fleece in the Sea of Monsters. His half-brother Tyson and friends Annabeth and Grover join hands with him to help him find it. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: Oh, a loveable misfit alien who is on the run from his own alien race, takes shelter on planet Earth and befriends Tip, an adventurous young girl who is on a quest to find her displaced mother Lucy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a chef, oblivious to the fact that the profession is phobic to rodents. But the ambitious creature partners with garbage boy Linguini and the duo set a fine-dining restaurant in Paris ablaze with their culinary skills. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: The Monkey King decides to accompany Tang Sanzang, a monk, who aims to retrieve sacred scriptures. On their way, they encounter an evil demon who wants to harm Sanzang to seek immortality. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: A decade after his father's death in the Battle of the Breach, Jake Pentecost forfeits his Jaeger training and makes a living off the black market. But the rise of a new Kaiju threat finds him teaming up with his adoptive sister, Mako Mori, co-pilot Nate Lambert and 15-year-old Jaeger enthusiast Amara Namani to prevent a global catastrophe. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: Gary 'Eggsy' Unwin, an unrefined but promising street kid, gets recruited and trained as an agent for a secret spy organisation. He goes through the organisation's gruelling training programme while a global threat emerges from an eccentric genius. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the 12 ancient animal signs of the 'Chinese Zodiac' stolen, Asian Hawk, brought to life by the phenomenal Jackie Chan who also doubles up as the director of this adrenaline-pumping action film, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. Accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady, Hawk bears it all to emerge successful in this film, which is known to be the third highest grosser in China and also earned two Guinness World Records. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Beauty And The Beast
programme.desc: Belle, a beautiful young woman, agrees to live with the Beast in exchange for the return of her abducted father. Soon, Belle discovers that her hideous captor is actually an enchanted prince. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin who suffers from amnesia, sets out to track down a CIA official whilst trying to retain memories of a forgotten past. (Film - Action)

programme.desc: The top four contestants go to Hatfield House where they are joined by food writer Nigella Lawson. Later, in an hour, they must prepare a venison dish and a trifle. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: To prepare for the wedding, Whitney and Noah travel to Montauk. Later, Noah receives a concerning call from Petra, a reporter. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: American Idol
programme.desc: Several participants from America showcase their singing talent in front of a panel of esteemed judges to win the title and a record label deal. (TV Show - Reality - Music)

programme.title: MasterChef US
programme.desc: In the hope of emerging victorious, the top three gear up to cook for the last time. They are given an hour for each course of their menu. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: Noah seeks guidance on how to handle the situation when allegations against him surface. In the meantime, Helen celebrates a birthday. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: The crew deals with mercury poising and a gas leak. Later, Michelle finds a surprising lead about her sister's disappearance after she helps a boy suffering from asthma. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A familiar set of eyes are watching over Negan and The Saviors during their conflict. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: Iron Man
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Mike and Sulley, two monsters, join the Monsters University in order to graduate as the scariest monsters on the planet. While Mike is serious about his ambitions, his peer Sulley whiles away most of his time. A special programme Roar Omega Roar becomes the perfect opportunity for them to showcase their skills. But when they play mischief with Dean Abigail Hardscrabble, she forbids them from participation. Mike decides that he will participate in the Scare Games challenge and takes a vow to leave school in case he loses. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: In a faraway swamp, in solitude, lives the green ogre 'Shrek', brought to life by the iconic Mike Myers. His lonely existence is infested with fairytale characters, sent there by the evil Lord Farquaad, who wants him to rescue his beautiful bride-to-be, Princess Fiona (Cameron Diaz) and thus, he sets out with Donkey, voiced by the unmatchable Eddie Murphy, to wage a war against a fire-breathing dragon and rescue the princess. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cars 3
programme.desc: The third film in this animation franchise follows Lightning McQueen, who enlists the help of race technician Cruz Ramirez to get back in the racing game after the rise of a younger, faster generation of racers. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Master Z: Ip Man Legacy
programme.desc: A disgraced martial artist's simple life is disturbed when he inadvertently fights a group of drug dealers. As the conflict deepens, several people around him are threatened. As a result, he is forced to rise against a very powerful and dangerous drug lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Cars 2
programme.desc: (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Avengers: Endgame
programme.desc: The actions of Thanos leave the universe in ruins with exactly half of all life disintegrated. The Avengers, however, refuse to give up and assemble again to try and bring back all the people that were lost, ready to do whatever it takes to undo the chaos caused by the Mad Titan. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: In the wake of a calamity of epic proportions, Manny is separated from Ellie and Peached and is left with Diego, Sid and his grandmother on an iceberg. As they attempt to return to his family, the motley friends are apprehended by pirates. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: On a special CIA mission, Dutch and his team of commandos must save themselves from an extra-terrestrial warrior deep in the Central American jungle. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A possible assassination of the Chinese premier and a conspiracy involving the MI-7, KGB and the CIA force the bosses at MI-7 to recall their brave but unconventional agent, Johnny English, who after a failed mission is seeking a shot at redemption. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Toy Story
programme.desc: Andy's favourite toy, Woody, is worried that after Andy receives his birthday gift, a new toy called Buzz Lightyear, his importance may get reduced. He thus hatches a plan to eliminate Buzz. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: An average-looking Dave (Jay Baruchel) is recruited as an apprentice by master sorcerer Balthazar Blake (Nicholas Cage). Together, they must save Manhattan from Blake's arch-nemesis Maxim Horvath. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Pirates Of The Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: Director Gore Verbinski and his crew set sail into the third chapter of this surreal, action-packed series that narrates the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow (Johnny Depp). This installation finds Captain Sparrow stuck in Davy Jones' locker after his encounter with the kraken. Now Elizabeth Swann (Keira Knightley) and Will Turner (Orlando Bloom) must team up with the notorious Captain Barbossa (Geoffrey Rush) and pirates from around the world to save Jack Sparrow and fight the evil East India Trading Company. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: The film, which is a directorial debut of Joe Johnston, tells the story of an absent-minded inventor who leaves his latest creation, an electromagnetic shrinking machine, unattended in his attic. The machine shrinks his and his neighbour's kids to 1/4-th of an inch, when they accidentally trigger it. When the newly tiny youngsters are tossed out with the trash, they must survive the long journey across the lawn. (Film - Family)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A few Jewish soldiers are on an undercover mission to bring down the Nazi government and put an end to the war. Meanwhile, a woman wants to avenge the death of her family from a German officer. (Film - War)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: As Noah's expose comes out and he is accused by six women of problematic behaviour, Whitney and Helen must decide where their allegiances lie. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: 9-1-1: Lone Star
programme.desc: The team tries to save a man trapped within a grain silo and TK fights Judd. Further, Michelle disregards a restraining order to confront someone while Owen grapples with cancer. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and his group have an argument, which leads to the consequences of choosing between life and death. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: The Chronicles Of Narnia: The Lion, The Witch And The Wardrobe
programme.desc: While playing, Lucy and her siblings find a wardrobe that lands them in a mystical place called Narnia. Here they realise that it was fated and they must now unite with Aslan to defeat an evil queen. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Mulan
programme.desc: Popular stars Ming-Na, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer and BD Wong lend their voices to recount a unique Chinese tale of a girl who takes an untrodden path of masquerading as a man just to save her land from the evil invaders. On gauging that her ailing father is in no position to defend his territory, 'Mulan' decides to take his place and lead her army to victory, but an unexpected company awaits her. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: Dusty, a cropduster dreams of becoming a great air racer. Along with his friend, Chug, a fuel truck, Dusty practises flying manoeuvres, in order to qualify for the Wings Across the World race. A night before the qualifiers, Dusty asks Skipper, an old navy war plane, for assistance. Skipper refuses to help Dusty. The next day at the race, Dusty is laughed upon by the audience but manages to wow them with his smooth flying. He just manages to qualify for the main race. It is then that Skipper asks Dusty the reason he wants to participate in the race and satisfied with his answer, he decides to help Dusty. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Night At The Museum: Secret Of The Tomb
programme.desc: The endearing museum security guard Larry Daley discovers that the Tablet of Ahkmenrah is corroding and the exhibits will not be able to come to life at night. After learning that the secret to restoring it lies with Ahkmenrah's parents, he sets out on a wild adventure across the globe to save the museum's precious inhabitants. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A garden snail named Theo dreams of winning the Indy 500 race. But his obsession with speed makes him an outcast in the slow-paced snail community. Later, an accident fuses Theo's DNA with nitrous oxide, gifting him incredible speed and accuracy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: An immensely powerful ancient mutant rises again and wishes to cleanse humankind in order to create a new world order. He recruits some powerful mutants, making them believe that mutants are superior to humans and it is their right to rule. To counter him, Raven tries to pull Charles out of his depressed state and lead a team of X-Men. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: Seven-year-old Tim is envious of his baby brother. But his animosity towards him doesn't last long when he learns that this baby, who calls himself The Boss, can talk and behave like an adult and is on a mission to stop Puppy Co from replacing the love for babies with puppies. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. (TV Show - Reality - Talent)

programme.title: The Predator
programme.desc: Quinn McKenna, an army sniper, along with some fugitives and a scientist, sets out to kill the Predator and save Rory, his son, who was abducted as his autism reflects advancement in human evolution. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: War veteran Will Sawyer is entrusted with the task of assessing the security of a high-profile building in China. He gets framed when aides of an international terrorist hack into the security system of the building. Sawyer then struggles to prove his innocence and save his family trapped in the fire. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Boyka: Undisputed IV
programme.desc: After he accidentally kills his opponent, underground fighter Yuri Boyka questions everything he stands for and tries to win the freedom of the dead man's wife through a series of fights. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Enchanted
programme.desc: The movie, part animation part live action, starring Amy Adams as a fairytale princess stuck in modern-day New York, embodies the best traditions of Disney. It depicts the life of a princess from the land of Andalasia, who is thrust into the heart of New York City by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy
programme.desc: Arthur Dent has just lost his perfect woman to another and as if that wasn't enough, his friend, who actually turns out to be an alien, informs him about Earth's impending doom. Soon, Arthur is whisked away from Earth seconds before it is exploded to make way for a new hyperspace motorway. Plus, there are other woes such as being wanted by the police, Earth II, an insane electronic encyclopaedia, the absences of tea and so on and so forth. But, Arthur's day is not entirely lost because he now stands a chance to win back his lady love while being on the greatest adventure off Earth. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Based on a story written by Hollywood's renowned Adam Horowitz, Walt Disney Pictures releases 'Tron: Legacy', a sequel to the 1982 cult film 'Tron', which created a buzz among video game geeks as well as movie buffs, that depicts the adventurous journey of Sam, son of a video game developer who mysteriously disappeared 20 years ago, as he is sucked into a virtual reality called the Grid, created by his father, with a mission to stop a corrupted programme from invading the human world. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Gone In Sixty Seconds
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Movie
programme.desc: (Film - Drama)

programme.title: A Brush With Love
programme.desc: Jamie Spellman, the owner of an art school and a struggling painter, makes a painting for a competition. Later, she tries to find someone in her life who resembles the man in her painting. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: 16 December
programme.desc: White collar crimes that drain the nation of precious foreign exchange is connected to the funding of international terrorism. The much-told Hollywood theme is retold in the Indian context with much needed technical wizadry. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Kismat
programme.desc:
A policeman’s son begins to work with criminals. Can his life be turned around?
Ajay (Govinda) is adopted and brought up by ACP Anand (Suresh Oberoi) and his biological mother Geeta (Rakhee), though the parents believe he is actually Anand’s child. Fate intervenes when Ajay begins to work with his real father, Rajan (Kabir Bedi).

programme.title: Eena Meena Deeka
programme.desc: Deeka (Vinod Khanna) had been in jail for several crimes, including bank robberies. When his prison sentence is over, Deeka decides to go straight. Unfortunately, while in a bank, he becomes a victim of a bungling bank robber, Inder or Eena (Rishi Kapoor), who needs money to get medical treatment for his mother (Dina Pathak). When the police arrive, they witness Eena with the notorious bank robber, and come to the conclusion that Deeka has gone back to his criminal ways. Deeka's attempts to convince them are in vain, and he must escape together with Eena for now, and he does so. The police are after Deeka, and he must get a hold of Eena and get him to confess to his crime, and therefore clear his name. But Eena is unwilling to confess, and runs away from Deeka. With the police on his tail, will Deeka be able to capture Eena, and will he be successful in getting him to agree to confess? (Action,Comedy,Crime)

programme.title: Ek Aur Ek Gyarah: By Hook or by Crook
programme.desc: Two petty thieves Tara and Sitara (Govinda & Sanjay Dutt respectively) get on the bad side of two wanted criminals, namely Panther and Cobra (Gulshan Grover and Ashish Vidyarthi ... (Action,Comedy,Musical,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Woh Lamhe
programme.desc: Based upon the life of actress Parveen Babi, this film describes the life of a schizophrenic actress Sana Azim, and the love of her life - Aditya Garewal. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Johny I Love You
programme.desc: Son of reformed criminal Suraj Singh, Johny (formerly Raju) falls in love with a woman out of his caste. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema is told by his father, Dinu, that generations of their family have always been slaves to the wealthy Thakurs. When Bheema does not heed this, and not only befriends Sonam, Thakur Daulat Singh's daughter, but also has a physical altercation with Raja Bahadur, Thakur's son, he is publicly whipped. Shortly thereafter his dad passes away after being bitten by a snake. Daulat finds out that Sonam likes Bheema and has her moved to London, and ensures that she forgets him. Subsequently, on her return as an adult she returns home and is told that Bheema is serving 3 years in prison for killing a male named Shamsher Singh. Nevertheless, she renews her friendship with him but will soon find him on the run from the Police - this time for killing a union leader named Kumar. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Apna Sapna Money Money
programme.desc: Kishan is a young man from Goa whose brain is full of every conceivable trick to make a quick buck. He cons people by slipping into different outfits and by assuming many guises. Julie, is a sexy club dancer with quite a local reputation, but behind her raunchy exterior is a compassionate, kind-hearted woman who goes out of her way to help the needy... (Comedy)

programme.title: Prem
programme.desc: Sanjay Verma has been having hallucinations of a past life as Shantanu. He meets Sonia Verma, and recognizes her as the girl named Lachi in his past life. He attempts to impress this upon Sonia, who is engaged, and is to be married to Vikram Malocha. (Drama,Musical,Romance)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Jurm
programme.desc: Police Inspector Shekhar Varma lives in Khar, Bombay, along with his wife, Meena, and a school-going daughter. His office is notified that Editor Ritesh Nandy has received death threats as he come across evidence that would expose some very influential people. (Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Aulad
programme.desc: Mamta lives a poor lifestyle with her husband, Dinu, and two sons, Mohan, and Sohan. When Ram Lal, the wealthy Zamindar, Kanta Prasad Gupta's Munim, comes to them to take Sohan to Mrs. Sharda Gupta for ten days, they reluctantly permit him to do so. After 10 days, Gupta himself approaches them and begs them to let his wife keep Sohan for life. They tearfully agree. Then Mohan gets into trouble, and Dinu scolds him, only to find out that Mohan has run away from home. A search proves futile, and the couple continue to live a childless life. Now 17 years later, Mamta is seriously ill, and asks Dinu to bring Sohan back. Dinu goes to the Zamindar's house where he meets a young man who identifies himself as the real son, Suraj, and informs him that Sohan has been asked to leave. A devastated Dinu loses his memory and roams listlessly on the streets of Calcutta, unable to remember anything. The question is will Dinu and Mamta be united with their sons during their respective lifetime, and what has become of Mohan, and who exactly is Suraj? (Comedy,Family)

programme.title: Suhagan
programme.desc: Suhaagan is a story about two sisters Janaki and Jyoti who live with their Parents Jamnadas and their mother played by Tanuja. Ramu lives in the same village and makes living by farming. Ramu loves Janaki but Janaki is not that interested in Ramu because she is more attracted to Murli who is much more wealthy than Ramu. Jamnadas prefers Ramu as being Janaki's husband because he thinks he is a good person and will not ask for big dowry. Janaki get married to Ramu and that is when all the trouble starts. (Romance)

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Kshatriya
programme.desc: In the arid region of Rajasthan, India; there are two royal families, Mirtagarth and Surjangarh who believes in a religious ritual which states that a warrior from each of these two families will come together annually to have a fierce battle with the winner having to sacrifice a baby buffalo and it will rain in that person's territory. This tradition must be fated to carry on by the future generation as it is a rule of nature set down by their kin. (Action,Drama,War)

programme.title: Daanveer
programme.desc: After the passing away of his widower and advocate dad, Vijay Srivastav takes it upon himself to raise his younger siblings, Vishal and Sudha. Years later, while Vishal is studying I.A.S., Sudha is of marriageable age, while Vijay makes a living driving an auto-rickshaw. He arranges Sudha's marriage with Anil, the only son of Ramprasad and Shanti, with a dowry of over 3 Lakh Rupees. The marriage takes place and Sudha re-locates to live with her in-laws. A few months later Vijay is informed that Sudha is expecting and brings her home. Shortly thereafter his world will be turned upside down when he finds out that Anil is getting married and had actually driven Sudha out as he suspected her of having an affair with another man. While Vijay attempts to deal with this situation, he does not know that Vishal has fallen in love with Jyoti, who is the daughter of Kalyan Singh - a man who is obsessed with avenging the death of his father at the hands of Vijay's dad, while Kalyan's son, Bheema, is all set to get married to Vijay's girlfriend, Chitra. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Ghatak: Lethal
programme.desc: A small town in Bombay is brutally subdued by a notorious gangster named Katya and his brothers. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kasoor
programme.desc: The film starts with the murder of Priti (Divya Dutta), wife of Shekhar (Aftab Shivdasani), a well-known journalist. Inspector Lokhande (Ashutosh Rana) investigates the case and accuses Shekhar of the murder, saying he has enough evidences to arrest him. Upon getting bail from the court, Shekhar's lawyer tells him that he will not be able to fight his case because he is a corporate lawyer. He asks him to contact Simran Bhargav (Lisa Ray), who is a criminal lawyer to fight his case. (Drama,Mystery,Thriller)

programme.title: Lashkar
programme.desc: Professor Anand lives a wealthy lifestyle in Bombay along with his wife, son, Raju, and a sister, Barkha, who will soon get married to Police Inspector Sumeet. Anand gets information that about a drug deal through Raghu, and together he and Sumeet apprehend Sangram Singh, who is arrested, tried in Court, but not found guilty. As a result, Sumeet resigns, and subsequently, Sangram's men break into Anand's house, kill his wife and son, assault Barkha, who is hospitalized, and loses her memory. Anand and Sumeet recruit Bhima, Amar, and Johnny, and they wage war on Sangram and his illegal operations. They do make a huge impact, and even influence Sangram's daughter to go against her dad. Their future plans change drastically when Sangram decides to strike back - this time by targeting each one of his opponents individually, and abducting Barkha. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Loha
programme.desc: A well-meaning but disgraced cop, is determined to fight a corrupt system, taking to task miscreants and criminals in his city. (Action)

programme.title: Jeena Marna Tere Sang
programme.desc: Amar is the son of a millionaire. He decides to avenge on Asha for slapping him in public, but later falls for her. He also discovers the truth about his father. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Fateh
programme.desc: Major Anand aided by 3 other military commandos, Karan, Salim & Ranvir undertakes a mission to bring to justice an arms dealer and drugs-smuggler, Munna. Things goes out of hand when Munna retaliates by shooting at Major Anand, wounding his left leg, and escaping with a scar on his face. Anand is then forced to retire only to open up a garage. Then word came in that Anand is shot dead, the commandos take part in his funeral, only to open up inquiry where they find out that a gangster named Babila may be responsible for the Major's death but they also find out that the day in question Babila was in police custody. Eventually the commandos decides to stay on and plan their way forward in locating the real killer(s). (Action)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Khiladi 420
programme.desc: Wealthy, world-wide business-man Shyam Prasad Bharadwaj would like to get his only daughter, Rittu marry to his business-partner Dev Kumar Malhotra. But what Shyam is unaware of is Dev is not what he claims to be but merely a con-man who is in debt with local gangsters and to worsen matters he plans to do away with the entire Bharadwaj family so that he can embezzle their property and estate. (Action,Comedy,Crime,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Ram Balram
programme.desc: Ram and Balram are 2 young boys who live with their loving parents. Their scheming uncle, Jagatpal, however kills the boy's father and mother. Jagatpal lies to the boys that their parents have been killed in an accident and promises to raise them himself. He enrolls the younger brother Balram, in school and eventually sends him off to join the police force. The older becomes a mechanic. Jagatpal has a tight hold on the boys, even when Ram is an adult, he still gives all his wages to his uncle and is only allowed to keep a few rupees for pocket money. (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Jaagruti
programme.desc: Vishal is a honest and diligent customs officer. He makes it known that he has never nor will ever accept any bribe. This does not auger well with various underworld dons, and even a member of parliament from the ruling party of India. One day Vishal is abducted and brutally killed in the presence of his younger brother, Jugnu. Jugnu himself is missing, and believed dead. Honest and diligent Gandhian Raghunath is outraged by this, and complains to the Chief Minister, Omiji. When Omiji attempts to inquire into this, his son is framed for selling tainted glucose in hospitals, which results in several deaths. Powerless to act, Omiji hesitates, and as a result Raghunath is killed. And then Jugnu returns, and now he must avenge his brother's death, but he is alone, and has an uphill task. (Action,Drama,Musical)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Josh
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan and Sharad Kapoor are the leaders of the two rival gangs. Aishwarya Rai is Shah Rukh Khan's twin sister. Shah Rukh is in love with Priya Gill. Chandrachur Singh is Sharad Kapoor's younger brother who studies in a catering college in Bombay. He comes to Goa to visit his brother and plans to go back and start a restaurant there. He sees Aishwarya and falls in love with her. Chandrachur gives up the idea of going back to Bombay and opens a bakery in Goa. When Shah Rukh comes to know about the romance between Aishwarya and Chandrachur, the fight between the gang turns more violent. How the conflict is resolved is the rest of the story. Written by gavin@sunny_deol2009@yahoo.com (Action,Drama,Musical,Romance)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: Rohan Arya lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and is a professional singer with Showbiz, which is managed by Inder Raj Bahl, while Rohan's personal Manager is Shikha Verma. Rohan and Shikha are attracted to each other, and after Journalist Sharad Rajpoot publishes their photographs, both publicly announce their forthcoming engagement. Then chaos enters their lives when Rohan's car is involved in an accident while he is in the company of a prostitute named Tara. Shikha refuses to have to do anything with him, while a frenzied media focuses in on Rohan's personal life - especially after word gets out that he may have known Tara before he met Shikha. (Action,Crime,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Nazar Ke Samne
programme.desc: Umesh is accused of killing a newspaper editor. His wife and mother hire a reputed lawyer named Sangram Singh Sahni, who agrees to be the defense lawyer without charging them any fees. The case is going in Umesh's favor, until a young man named Jai Kumar, comes as an eye-witness and states that he has seen Umesh commit the murder from his balcony right opposite the venue of the murder. Umesh is convicted and sentenced to death. Umesh's sister, Sarita, finds out that Jai was paid to lie, and she approaches him to change his testimony. He refuses, but subsequently relents when he finds out the havoc he has caused in their lives. He approached Advocate Sahni, who attempts to do his best to get a new trial, in vain, though and Umesh is set to die within one week. Now Jai must come up with the person who really killed the Newspaper Editor, and the only clue he has is a photograph of the killer's shoes... (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Yaraana
programme.desc: Lalita (Madhuri Dixit) is married under duress from her maternal uncle, Madhi (Tej Sapru) to a cruel and possessive man, JB (Raj Babbar). (Action,Drama,Musical,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Betaabi
programme.desc: Film about arranged marriage in India

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: Ayaan lives a very wealthy lifestyle with his married brother, Karan and his wife, Anju; a younger sister, Yamini, and brother, Rahul; his mom, and grandma; and runs a garage. One day he meets with beautiful model, Ahana, and falls head over heels in love with her. She forgets her personal diary at his garage, and through this Ayaan woos, wins her heart, and both get married. Ahana soon finds out that despite of Ayaan's wealth, his family is very conservative and tradition-bound. This causes some bitterness between the newly-weds, which gets worse when she becomes pregnant and wants to abort the child. While visiting her mom on their dog's birthday, Ahana has an accident which results in a miscarriage. Ayaan blames her for losing the child, but his mother convinces him and he apologizes. Few months later, Ahana becomes pregnant again, and that's when she finds out that Ayaan had pulled wool over her eyes through her personal diary... (Romance)

programme.title: Saaya
programme.desc: Tanya is a rich woman who is married to another rich man named Vinod. But their lives change by Vinod's death. Tanya than starts falling in love with a doctor named Akash. But Akash is in love with a woman named Maya and after some time gets married to her. But their marriage does not last long. Because, first Maya leaves him to travel to another part of India to help people who are sick; and then Akash receives news that she is dead. Tanya comes up to console Akash and hopes that he will now love, accept and marry her. But Akash does not do so, as he is still immersed in Maya's memories, and believes that Maya is still alive and calling out to him. Is Akash going out of his mind? (Horror,Mystery,Romance)

programme.title: Yes Boss
programme.desc: There are lots of poor people in India who want to get rich soon. A woman named Seema is one of them. She is very beautiful and has an admirer by the name of Sidharth. This man is very rich, and says he wants to marry Seema. But Seema finds out that he is already married, and has no intention to marry her. He assures her that he does not love his wife, and will divorce her, and then marry Seema. Then there is the story of another poor person, a man by the name of Rahul. Rahul is also an admirer of Seema. But Rahul works for Sidharth. Rahul knows that Sidharth is going to betray Seema and have an affair with someone else very soon. Rahul also knows that Seema wants to get rich very quickly. How will be convince her about Sidharth? Rahul is also afraid If Sidharth finds out he will fire Rahul, thus he will remain a poor man all his life (Drama,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Bhishma
programme.desc: Paro, her mother, and her brother, Natwar, find an unconscious man near their town. They bring him over to their house, nurse and nurture him back to good health, only to find out that he has the mind of a 12 year of old child, and name him Bhola. Years pass by, Paro has fallen in love with Bhola, for he rescued her from a molester, and both would like to get married. Before that could happen, Bhola is viciously attacked and left for dead by Paro's molester, and is hospitalized. While in hospital, Police Sub-Inspector Abhimanyu Verma finds out that Bhola is not who he claims to be but a homicidal maniac, wanted for killing three policemen - named Bhisma - and is possibly masquerading as a 12 year old child to hide from the police.

programme.title: Prem Deewane
programme.desc: Radha (Pooja Bhatt) and Manohar (Vivek Mushran) love each other and want to get married, but Radha's dad (Ashok Saraf) does not approve of their marriage as Manohar comes from a poor family. He instructs Radha not to leave the house, but Radha finds a way to escape and goes to Manohar's house. Anticipating more obstacles, they run away, guided by Radha's uncle Natwarlal(Prem Chopra). Natwarlal convinces them that they must kidnap a wealthy person and demand a big ransom and take the money to appease Radha's dad. It is then they start to realize that their uncle has some other devious plans for them. (Action,Adventure,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Krishan Avtaar
programme.desc: Police Inspector Krishan Kumar lives a middle class life with his lovely wife, Suman. Suman gets pregnant and gives birth to a baby girl but tragically passes away, leaving Krishan widowed, heart-broken and devastated. Krishan also encounters a tumor, which is presently inoperable, and may eventually lead to his death. Then a large number of the city's children go missing, and Krishan, together with Inspector Avtaar are assigned to investigate this matter. They are also asked to investigate the murder of fellow police inspector Vishnu Sawant. Krishan's investigation leads him to corruption in his very own department; the involvement of a prominent minister in the government; and the daughter of Inspector Sawant himself. Faced with failing health and vision, Krishan must make his move quickly before he becomes totally disabled from doing any more police work. (Action)

programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po is now living his dream as The Dragon Warrior, protecting the Valley of Peace alongside his friends and fellow kung fu masters, The Furious Five - Tigress, Crane, Mantis, Viper and Monkey. But Po’s new life of awesomeness is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain, who plans to use a secret, unstoppable weapon to conquer China and destroy kung fu. It is up to Po and The Furious Five to journey across China to face this threat and vanquish it. But how can Po stop a weapon that can stop kung fu? He must look to his past and uncover the secrets of his mysterious origins; only then will he be able to unlock the strength he needs to succeed. (Animation,Family)

programme.title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
programme.desc: Inspired by the life of a fearless young officer who made history by becoming the first Indian female Air Force officer to fly in a combat zone during the 1999 Kargil War (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Hello Charlie
programme.desc: Charlie, a simpleton daydreamer, currently a pizza delivery boy is tasked with driving his uncle's truck , Girnaar Express, to deliver a gorilla from Mumbai to the jetty at Diu. However, Charlie is unaware that Gorilla is disguised business tycoon MD Makwana, who is on the run after committing a multi-crore scam. (Adventure,Comedy)

programme.title: Bruce Lee
programme.desc: When a stuntman is mistaken for a police officer, he begins fighting crime. (Romance,Action,Drama)

programme.title: A Flying Jatt
programme.desc: Jatt is a reluctant super hero that fights crime and protects people. He meets his match in the evil Raka who he must face off to save the day. (Fantasy,Action,Adventure)

programme.title: Secret Superstar
programme.desc: Insia Malik is a talented 15-year-old school girl from Baroda whose spirit is ripped because her mother is in a troubled and violent marriage. Of course she still dares to pursue her dream of becoming a singer and she also valiantly attempts to free her mother from her conservative, cold father. (Drama,Music)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail. (Action,Crime)

programme.title: Phir Milenge
programme.desc: Tamanna Sahni (Shilpa Shetty) is a dedicated staff member of a top advertising agency, her ideas and designs have mainly contributed to the success of the agency. She leaves for a college reunion and meets her college sweetheart Rohit (Salman Khan). They rekindle their love for each other and share some intimate moments together. Eventually Rohit leaves and Tamanna settles back into her normal daily routine. When her sister, Tanya, has an accident she decides to give her own blood to save her. However her doctor, Dr. Raisingh (Revathi), tells her that she has been tested positive for HIV. Tamanna's world turns upside down and she desperately tries to get into contact with Rohit but in vain. Her situation is soon spread around the office and she loses her job. Angered by her unfair dismissal she searches for a lawyer to fight her case. Eventually Tarun Anand (Abhishek Bachchan) agrees to represent her... (Drama)

programme.title: Good Boy, Bad Boy
programme.desc: As a new principal of a college [of fairly bad reputation], Mr. Awasthi has to take steps which are stringent and yet, fruitful. He has a handful of problems: good students emigrating from the college, the bad ones disrupting the class and similar others. His corrective measures have changed the scenario drastically, except that it has a small glitch- There are two R. Malhotras. Rajan Malhotra is the nerdy "Good Boy", while the other R. Malhotra, Raju is the spoiled "bad Boy" of the campus. Their Identity cards are mixed up and somehow they find themselves in the opposite sections. The Good one in the bad boys' section and vice versa. Now the principal knows this, and he has proposed their name [real Raju- the bad boy] in the annual quiz and [real rajan- the good boy] dance competitions respectively. Time is short. It is now upon them to prove their mettle in the competitions, in the eyes of their parents... (Comedy,Musical,Romance)

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: In the final days of World War II, the Nazis attempt to use black magic to aid their dying cause. The Allies raid the camp where the ceremony is taking place, but not before a demon - Hellboy - has already been conjured. Joining the Allied forces, Hellboy eventually grows to adulthood, serving the cause of good rather than evil. (Fantasy,Action,Science Fiction)

programme.title: Race 3
programme.desc: The Singh family comprises of Shamsher his step-son Sikandar, twins Suraj and Sanjana. They run a business of illegal arms and trade with the help of their friend Yash. Things get dramatic when Jessica meets Sikandar and the family ties are strained under each character’s ulterior motives. (Thriller,Action)

programme.title: Radhe - Your Most Wanted Bhai
programme.desc: Radhe: Your Most Wanted Bhai is an upcoming 2020 Indian action film directed by Prabhu Deva and produced by Salman Khan, Sohail Khan and Atul Agnihotri. The film stars Salman Khan, Disha Patani, Randeep Hooda and Jackie Shroff. It was officially announced on 18 October 2019. (Action,Crime,Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Businessman 2
programme.desc: The movie starts with Karthik(Ram)who runs a multimillion-dollar company in Portugal living with his family. He meets another rich women Anushka (Sonal Chauhan) for a business deal. They both got engaged but karthik's family was disappointed of this proposal. One of the companies of Karthik gets in to trouble due to a case registered by Green Army headed by Divya (Rakul Preet)against his factory and he heads to India to sort out the issue. being engaged to Anushk, Karthik goes to an extent to impress Divya in an attempt of convincing her to withdraw the case.Karthik reveals his actual purpose of coming to India later as he is the son of Bhupathi's sister, who has been staying away from family for 25 years.Bhupati meets karthik for marriage proposal with Divya. Karthik then goes to her village to reunite the family against all odds and marry Divya. Eventually,karthik (Ram) reunites the family which were separated for 25 years and marries to Divya bringing Pandaga for the family (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Main Tera Hero
programme.desc: This love story begins with the mischievous, clever, charming, a daredevil and the HERO who falls in love with Sunaina. How can a Hero’s love story be complete without a villain! So walks in Angad the corrupt cop, who wants to forcibly marry Sunaina and to make things more spicy also does Ayesha who is madly in love with our Hero. A massy entertaining romantic drama ensues, which takes our Hero from the mountainous Ooty, to the fun college campus of Bangalore, and then to a beautiful mansion, in gorgeous Thailand. (Romance,Comedy)

programme.title: Welcome Back
programme.desc: Sagar and Uday are gangsters who have let go of their old ways, or so they believe. They try to find a suitable groom for their sister, whose existence they became aware of only recently. (Comedy)

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: A "National Geographic" film crew is taken hostage by an insane hunter, who takes them along on his quest to capture the world's largest - and deadliest - snake. (Adventure,Horror,Thriller)
